ProteinName	Chondroitin sulfate synthase 2 (EC 2.4.1.175) (EC 2.4.1.226) (Chondroitin glucuronyltransferase 2) (Chondroitin-polymerizing factor) (ChPF) (Glucuronosyl-N-acetylgalactosaminyl-proteoglycan 4-beta-N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase II) (N-acetylgalactosaminyl-proteoglycan 3-beta-glucuronosyltransferase II) (N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase 2)
GeneName	CHPF CSS2 UNQ651/PRO1281
Length	613
Function	Has both beta-1,3-glucuronic acid and beta-1,4-N-acetylgalactosamine transferase activity. Transfers glucuronic acid (GlcUA) from UDP-GlcUA and N-acetylgalactosamine (GalNAc) from UDP-GalNAc to the non-reducing end of the elongating chondroitin polymer. Seems to act as a specific activating factor for CHSY1 in chondroitin polymerization (PubMed:12716890).
